{{Wireless embedded system |brand=EnGenius |model=ESR750 |revision=H |upc=655216005723 |ean= |asin=B007IGLSLO |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=05/03/2012 |manuf_country= |manuf=Senao |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability=just released |type=wireless router |fcc_id=A8JESR750H |ic_id=10103A-ESR750H |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1.25 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Ralink |cpu1_model=RT3883 |cpu1_cspeed=500 |fla1=16 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX25L12835 |fla1_num= |ram1=256 |ram1_brand=Samsung |ram1_model=K4B1G1646G-BCH9 |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num=1 |jtag= |serial= |wi1_chip1_brand=Ralink |wi1_chip1_model=RT3883 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=an |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=3 |wi1_rxchains=3 |wi1_sstreams=3 |wi2_chip1_brand=Ralink |wi2_chip1_model=RT5392 |wi2_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL,RP-SMA |wi2_txchains=2 |wi2_rxchains=2 |wi2_sstreams=2 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Atheros |sw_model=AR8327 |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=abgn |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip=192.168.0.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui=00:02:6F |oui_eth=00:02:6F }} '''XtraRange Dual-Band Wireless-N Router'''
[http://www.engeniustech.com/home-networking/routers/16330-esr750h-coming-soon Product page] on ''EnGenius'' (USA)
==Additional external links== *[http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/other/ces-2012/31666-ces-2012-engenius-launches-long-range-n-router-line ''CES 2012: EnGenius Launches Long-Range N Router Line'' - '''SmallNetBuilder''']
===Reviews=== *[http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-reviews/31842-engenius-esr750h-xtrarange-dual-band-wireless-n-router-reviewed Reviewed on '''SmallNetBuilder'''] :3x SiGe 2537L 5GHz power amplifiers *[http://www.shadowandy.net/2012/06/engenius-esr750h-xtrarange-dual-band-wireless-n-router.htm Review on '''Shadowandy.net'''] :The internal antennas are used for the 5GHz radio. :The external antennas are used for the 2.4GHz radio.
The default SSIDs used may be '''EnGeniusXXXXXX''' and '''EnGeniusXXXXXX_5G'''.
